prompts: Create a majestic dragon-type Pokemon with shimmering blue scales and sharp, metallic features.
I want a legendary Pokemon that embodies time and space with a powerful, regal appearance.
Generate a mythical creature that has a sleek, futuristic design and is adorned with crystalline elements.
Make a Pokemon that showcases a blend of steel and dragon types, featuring a striking color palette.
Imagine a powerful, ancient Pokemon with a streamlined body and intricate details representing time manipulation.
Design a Pokemon that looks like a guardian of time, combining elegance with a fierce presence.
Show me a legendary Pokemon that dwells in ancient ruins, showcasing blue and silver hues in its design.
